actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for agreeing, with amendments, to the Senate amendments to H.R. 4998, to amend the Federal Reserve Act to require that detailed minutes of Federal Open Market Committee meetings shall be published on a deferred basis.

summary.text: Expresses the agreement of the House of Representatives, with amendments, to the Senate amendments to H.R. 4998 (Federal Reserve Act amendments).

titles.title: A resolution providing for agreeing, with amendments, to the Senate amendments to H.R. 4998, to amend the Federal Reserve Act to require that detailed minutes of Federal Open Market Committee meetings shall be published on a deferred basis.
